Answer: An object at rest tends to stay at rest and an object in motion tends to stay in motion at a constant velocity| unless acted upon by an external force.
Distractor2: For every action there is an equal and opposite reaction.
Distractor3: The rate of change of momentum of a body is proportional to the force applied to it.
